mapper.select: select * from v_pimstafftype t1 where pimstafftypeid=#{id}
select * from v_pimstafftype t1 where pimstafftypeid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`PIMSTAFFTYPEID`, t1.`PIMSTAFFTYPENAME`, t1.`SBM`, t1.`SHGZ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_PIMSTAFFTYPE` t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.`SBM` <> 'BX' )
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.PIMSTAFFTYPEID, t1.PIMSTAFFTYPENAME, t1.SBM, t1.SHGZ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_PIMSTAFFTYPE t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1 AND ( t1.SBM <> 'BX' )
SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLE`, t1.`PIMSTAFFTYPEID`, t1.`PIMSTAFFTYPENAME`, t1.`SBM`, t1.`SHGZ`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_PIMSTAFFTYPE` t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLE, t1.PIMSTAFFTYPEID, t1.PIMSTAFFTYPENAME, t1.SBM, t1.SHGZ, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_PIMSTAFFTYPE t1 WHERE t1.ENABLE = 1
